author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Privacy tech is berry cool.

The Big Berry @reka_eth is joining us this week at the Roundtable to share the latest on @RiscZero, @boundless_xyz, and the benefits of berrifiable compute in your daily routine.

RSVP below! https://t.co/uuigBwvKoT
